text: During my academic journey at Universitat Politècnica de València (UPV) I studied a bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, specialized in Software Engineering, building a solid coding foundation and learning how to work in an agile environment. My last year as a student I participated in an exchange program attending artificial intelligence and English courses at Korea University (KU), Seoul.

After finishing my studies, I started my career with an internship at PlayJoy Games as a full-stack developer. Pursuing a career and personal growth, I joined ADD Informatica as a front-end developer. Then, aiming to follow my motivation in front-end development, I started a career transition to web app development.
